inclusion.criterion: Relapsed or refractory systemic Anaplastic Large Cell Lymphoma (ALCL)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Relapsed or refractory mature T-cell lymphoma to include peripheral T-cell lymphoma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma, which is a type of brain tumor, but the text does not specify it as relapsed or refractory ALCL or mature T-cell lymphoma.

inclusion.criterion: Adult T-cell lymphoma; Extranodal natural killer (NK)/T-cell lymphoma, nasal type; Enteropathy-type T-cell lymphoma; Hepatosplenic T-cell lymphoma; Subcutaneous panniculitis-like T-cell lymphoma; Angioimmunoblastic T-cell lymphoma
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: All patients should have evaluable or measurable disease on entry to study
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma, indicating measurable disease.

inclusion.criterion: Histology confirmed by Laboratory of Pathology, National Cancer Institute (NCI)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Performance Status Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) less than or equal to 2
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is a 45-year-old man, which suggests an ECOG performance status of 0-1.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is 45 years old, which meets this criterion.

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine less than or equal to 1.5 mg/dl or creatinine clearance greater than 50 ml/min for patients at least 18 years.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is 45 years old, which meets this criterion.

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin less than 1.5 x upper limit of normal (ULN) (patients with elevation of total bilirubin consistent with Gilbert's disease are eligible providing they have a normal direct bilirubin)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: aspartate aminotransferase (AST) less than or equal to 2.5 x ULN;
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of high-dose steroids, which suggests an ANC greater than 500/mm^3.

inclusion.criterion: and platelet greater than or equal to 50,000/mm^3;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: unless hematological impairment due to organ involvement by lymphoma.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma, which is a type of brain tumor, but the text does not suggest hematological impairment.

exclusion.criterion: No active central nervous system (CNS) lymphoma.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma, which is a type of brain tumor, but the text does not suggest CNS lymphoma.

exclusion.criterion: Patients should not have received systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy within 3 weeks of study entry.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient has received temozolomide and CPT-11, which suggests they have received systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy within the past few months.

exclusion.criterion: No history of diabetes mellitus requiring insulin treatment.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No evidence of symptomatic cardiac disease (e.g. symptomatic congestive heart failure, unstable angina pectoris, exertional angina pectoris, cardiac arrhythmia).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and has received various treatments, but the text does not provide enough information to determine if they meet all the inclusion criteria. The patient's age and performance status suggest they may be eligible, but further evaluation is needed.
